content.content:
talking heads frontman david byrne approached lost art to assist in developing the creative direction for his 'reasons to be cheerful' project. commencing as a series of talks and expanding to become a digital platform, rtbc shines light on positive happenings around the world—including the release of david's new album 'american utopia'. one year later additional artwork was created to celebrate the first anniversary of the project.

branding, campaign


design—chris hopkins
production—steph smith
commissioned by—david byrne & todo mundo
